name: Xen
overview:
Xen puts the power of your interest graph where it belongs - in your hands. In seconds, you can create an account that reflects the real you. Your Xen account is as special as you are - use it to express your feelings on anything and everything that makes you unique.

While Xen is a fantastic way to quickly build and shape your unique persona, the real magic happens when you use it to make connections. Learn which of your friends matches you the most in movies. Discover a new band. Follow the interests of an influential person. See what’s trending. The more you explore, the more you’ll experience how fun and insightful it can be to communicate and connect using your interests.

And that’s just the beginning. You’ll be able to do more exciting things with your Xen account in the near future, so stay tuned!
